node.title: BHP's vaccine mandate unlawful
node.description: The full bench of the Fair Work Commission has found a decision by mining giant BHP to makeÂ vaccinations at a Hunter Valley mine mandatory was not lawful or reasonable.
node.content: ["The full bench of the Fair Work Commission has found a decision by mining giant BHP to make\u00a0vaccinations at a Hunter Valley mine mandatory was not lawful or reasonable.", "More than 30 workers were stood down at\u00a0BHP Billiton's Mt Arthur coal mine\u00a0were stood down after being unable to provide evidence of their vaccination status.", "Lawyers for union officials fought against the mandate, arguing there was a lack of consultation.", "Today the commission's full bench said the direction was not covered by the mine's enterprise agreement for workers.", "More to come."]
